seo.title: Our Studio | KOTA Agency London & New York
seo.metaDesc: We are KOTA, award-winning Creative Studio based in London & New York. Meet our expert team of creative designers, developers and strategists.
seo.opengraphTitle: Our Studio | KOTA Agency London & New York
seo.opengraphDescription: We are KOTA, award-winning Creative Studio based in London & New York. Meet our expert team of creative designers, developers and strategists.
seo.twitterTitle: Our Studio | KOTA Agency London & New York
seo.twitterDescription: We are KOTA, award-winning Creative Studio based in London & New York. Meet our expert team of creative designers, developers and strategists.

heroInfos.title: Proudly signing every piece
heroInfos.text: Our team of experts is made up of creatives with technical know-how, strategists who think outside the box, and developers who push innovation. And then there’s Buddy, the French Bulldog.
heroInfos.subtitle: Because it should never just be work, it should be a work of art.

introInfos.title: Artists by nature. Rebels by choice.
introInfos.text: Our expert team is made up of creatives with technical knowhow, strategists who think outside the box, and developers who push innovation. And then there’s Buddy, the French Bulldog.
introInfos.textIntro:
We’re a team of talented creatives who live and breathe great design. We’re not just coders who take instructions, we’re artists who take inspiration from the wider creative world of music, film and the arts.

By soaking up culture, sharing new ideas and staying on the pulse of the latest trends, we develop brands, design websites and deliver campaigns that break the mould, and fight back against boring.

teamMember.name: Nat
teamMember.bio: Having started his career in design, Nat quickly realised his true strengths lay in programming. Never forgetting his design background, Nat strives to breathe life into sharp user experiences and performant tech stacks. Nat has over ten years of experience building bespoke WordPress websites, along with a range of front-end technologies.

teamMember.name: Maja
teamMember.bio: A true organisation freak, Maja makes sure everything runs smoothly in the KOTA studio. Bringing her experience from Poland and France, where she's worked on the biggest international accounts, she keeps communication flowing throughout the team and for our clients. Being a proud 'crazy dog lady' you will most probably find her walking around London with her adorable French Bulldog under her arm.

teamMember.name: Matt
teamMember.bio: Matt is a designer specialising in digital experiences, with a focus on animated and interactive content. It was at Southampton University where he developed his skills in interface design, whilst specialising in motion graphics. If he isn’t sat at his computer, you’ll most likely find him either playing footie or watching his beloved Chelsea.

teamMember.name: Ed
teamMember.bio:
Bad-ass designer, KOTA director and ex-rock and roll star. Ed is an extremely talented Graphic Designer whose love for art and design came from his younger years collecting vinyl for their fancy sleeves. Years later, after being inspired by his art teacher (big-ups Mr Pinnock), Ed graduated from the University of the Arts London (LCC) and then worked in a few different industries including post production TV, managing businesses in the Hospitality industry, and of course music.

After joining forces with James and Jonny in 2013, he has helped shape the company as it is today with a mixture of creative flair, organisation, business strategy and team management.

teamMember.name: James
teamMember.bio:
James fell in love with design when he was 17. 

After a stint at college where he mostly learnt that college wasn’t for him, he busked his way into the industry and had eight great years as a freelance graphic designer contracting for some of the biggest agencies in London before setting up KOTA with Jonny Bradford in 2012.

teamMember.name: Jonny
teamMember.bio:
Avid Cambridge supporter and Co-Founder of KOTA.

Having left school at the wee age of 16, Jonny quickly discovered his calling as a Developer. A self-proclaimed 'Dogsbody', he is the glue that holds KOTA together, linking the clients, development, marketing and design teams. His knowledge and experience comes from working with some of the most respected brands in the world, including Apple, Google, YouTube and Unilever.

teamMember.name: James
teamMember.bio: James is a designer and art director specialising in interactive design and branding. He's passionate about elegant design solutions and beautifully realised creative ideas. James has spent over a decade working in big and small agencies, both full time and as a freelancer. He’s as comfortable solving complex UX problems for digital products as he is dreaming up surreal artwork for big brands.

teamMember.name: Bekah
teamMember.bio:
Bekah is a front-end developer, and a big advocate for accessibility and performance on the web. With a previous career in events management, Bekah has a keen eye for detail and takes pride in crafting a polished user experience.
When she’s not writing code, Bekah loves to travel and play video games, and one day plans to live up to her namesake and buy a farm. (E-I-E-I-O)

teamMember.name: Em
teamMember.bio: Having worked in mostly music-based roles previously, Em comes from a creative background, specialising in key accounts management and international music education. After qualifying as a PRINCE2 practitioner, she decided to combine her loves of creativity, organisation (and spreadsheets!) and take on the role of project manager.

teamMember.name: Oscar
teamMember.bio: Full stack developer with many years of experience, specialised in frontend development. He worked in multiple fields thought the years, building Android and iOS applications, MacOS software, and building web services. Dogs lover, travel enthusiast and backpacker from time to time.

teamMember.name: Nicola
teamMember.bio: Nicola is a designer with a background in fashion design and has worked for premium brands that took her all over the world. After a decade of working in fashion, she followed her creative curiosity and changed careers to become a graphic designer. She has a love for branding, digital design and karaoke - Shania Twain is her go-to.

teamMember.name: Ffion
teamMember.bio: With a varied background spanning DIY to fashion, Ffion is our in-house marketing maven. When she’s not making our clients go viral, she’s probably trying a new recipe or walking her little dog, Pero.

teamMember.name: Margo
teamMember.bio: Having spent nearly a decade working as an interior designer, Margo swapped the proverbial paint brush for a pen and decided to become a graphic designer. She lives in Slovenia, where she takes an interest in art, nature and of course, design.

teamMember.name: Alex
teamMember.bio: Based in Greece, Alex took an interest in web development when he was young and has passionately pursued it ever since. He’s a big fan of video games, watches and building computers from scratch.

teamInfos.text: You will find our team working across Creative Web Design, Web Development, Branding, and Digital Marketing.

whyItem.itemDescription: We care about our work, our clients and our people. We treat everyone with honesty and respect and expect to be treated in the same way.
We approach every challenge with energy and vigour. We come up with innovative solutions and we’re not afraid to think big.
Every member of our team has a creative streak. This is at the heart of what we do and central to our core values.
Our working environment is relaxed and light-hearted. We listen to good tunes and eat good biscuits.
We take pride in our work and sign every piece of it. We strive for perfection in everything we do.

beliefList.title: Never settle for second best
beliefList.subtitle: No matter how tempting, we don’t take the easy way out. Every project is an opportunity to push the boundaries and steal the show.

beliefList.title: Make it beautiful, thoughtful and impactful
beliefList.subtitle: As artists, it’s our job to ensure every website we design is stunning to look at, seamless to navigate and successful in its purpose.

beliefList.title: Ideas start alone but are stronger together
beliefList.subtitle: Our best work happens when we put our heads together and open ourselves to fresh perspectives, because finding solutions is not a solo-mission.

beliefList.title: Trust our people and process
beliefList.subtitle: We trade hierarchy for trust and politics for processes, allowing talent to flourish and new ideas to come to life through creative autonomy.

beliefList.title: Always consider the bigger picture
beliefList.subtitle: For every project we embark on, we stay anchored to the impact that our work will have for you, your industry and for the wider community.
